Goal Representation: Store all the clothes on the bed to the closetdrawer. Then find the pillow and put it on the bed

['1. Store all the clothes on the bed in the closet or drawer.', '2. Find the pillow.', '3. Put the 
pillow on the bed.']

behavior store_clothes(clothes: item, closetdrawer: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(clothes, closetdrawer)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bed: item where:
            is_bed(bed)
        bind closetdrawer: item where:
            is_closetdrawer(closetdrawer)
        foreach clothes: item:
            if is_clothes(clothes) and on(clothes, bed):
                store_clothes(clothes, closetdrawer)

LLM Answer:
To store all the clothes on the bed in the closet or drawer, first, gather all the clothes from the 
bed. Then, go to the bedroom where the closet and drawers are located. Open the closet door or the d
rawer, and neatly place the clothes inside. Make sure to arrange them properly so that they fit well
 and don't get wrinkled. Once all the clothes are stored, close the closet door or drawer.

Goal Representation:
behavior store_clothes_in_closetdrawer(clothes: item, closetdrawer: item):
    body:
        assert is_clothes(clothes) 
        assert is_closetdrawer(closetdrawer) 
        achieve inside(clothes, closetdrawer)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        foreach clothes: item:
            if is_clothes(clothes) and not visited(clothes):
                observe(clothes, "Check if the item is clothing on the bed")
                if is_clothes(clothes):
                    bind closetdrawer: item where:
                        is_closetdrawer(closetdrawer)
                    store_clothes_in_closetdrawer(clothes, closetdrawer)
        achieve closed(closetdrawer)
